directions: In a small mixing bowl break up the tuna with a fork. Toss with the celery, onion, and parsley. Add the mayonnaise, mustard and season with pepper, to taste. Stir to combine. Add lemon juice, to taste, if using. Cook's note: Substitute 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard for the whole-grain mustard and add 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish

ingredients: Two 6-ounce cans white meat tuna packed in water, drained
2 tablespoons minced red onion, soaked in cold water for 5 minutes and drained
title: Tuna Salad
